♣ 8
South:
♠ Q953
♥ K64
♦ A85
♣ A62
WestNorthEastSouth
1♣
Pass1♠Pass2♠
Pass2NT1Pass3♠
Pass4♣2Pass4♦3
Pass4NT4Pass5♠5
Pass6♠AP
1. Cue bid, surplus
2. Cue bid, a ♣ stopper
3. Cue bid, a ♦ stopper
4. Blackwood 0314, for ♠
5. A=2/5 or 5/5, Q(S)=1
